div.ab:
موالى
پن
العريف سالم
ستّة دراهــم
عرفات نصف وربع
حمودة الحاوي خرص حرص قرض على
سلطان ربع
الوصيّة الدّناوي پماپه ثمانية
وسدس
درهمين ونصف المخلص درهمين ونصف
الرّشد
سعد الوالي رباع
محمّد غلّة بطّة على درهم درهم
الحرپسى حرص وبلادر على
درهمين ا حرقه
بن الشّاعر على نــصف
فبدله ــى پصف
ســ الوالي عنده رباع وسبع
محمّد بن مالك الجزّي درهميــن
الشّريف أبو الفرج خمسة دراهم
عثمان
الوالى پلاپپن
پصف ورنع و
الطاهر درهمين
پن باصر رنع وپمن مربعه
كرز بن ياسين النّجّار درهمين ونصــف
وسپه دراهم
العساكر ربع
الحاوي ربع وحربه وخرّوبة
على سپه دراهم
جعفر بن حسن درهــم
ياسي بن أنكتوا درهــم
ملية الحبشيّة كسا اليهود على
أحد وعشرين درهم
حسن السّقّا نصف وثمن
مرجان بن همام درهم وربع
الشّيخ علّام ربع وحربه وخرّوبة
كرام
الوصيّة العــ
حمزة بن بنت العزّي درهم
علام سغيد ارپعــه درأهم
صــڤى وربع
جابر العزيز ربع
فرج الزّمام تلاتة دراهم على
ورپع
طوق لأم قشّاش درهمين
عبد اللّه الطّرناحي ربع
عزيز بن سي النّاجي درهم وربع
أبو خميس أربعة عشر درهم هي
لجلب جروم ومرسله وقد
يماني
أبو حسن تمانية دراهم ونصف و
رزقته قادمة ومرسله جروم
وتلاپه دراهم
درهم حرص على
ــسلپن معه لور اغر
الوصيّة الدّناوي القناويّ پماپه ثمانية
دراهم وربع مسدّس
حعڤر درهم و
پن حماد الملاحى
سعد غلام الوالي رباع
أبو محمّد غلّة بطّة على درهم
وتمن وخمس
ا حرقه رهن على
نــصف إلّا حربه خرّوبة
ــى پصف
لقيمة الكيّال تلاتة دراهم وربع
مخروج الكيّال درهمين سوّا
عالي شرف الدّين قتادة رهن على عشر دراهم
وربع وسدس
عثمان بن حمزة تمّام رهن على عشرين درهم
ونصف سوّا
عبد اللّه بن ياسي خمسة دراهم ونصف

*** muwālī ***
*** bn ***
ăl ʿarīf sālim ***
sittaẗu darāhima ***
ʿarafātu niṣf:un wa rubʿ:un ***
ḥamūdaẗu ăl ḥāwī ḥaraṣa ḫarṣ:un qarḍ:un ʿalà **
*** sulṭān rubʿ:un
ḥusayn:uni ăl ḥiǧāziyyu ăṣ ṣayrāfiyyu tamāniyaẗu darāhima
wa rubʿ:un wa suds:un
ăl qāḍī ăl ḥakamu muḫliṣu dirhamayni wa niṣf:un
ăr rušdu ʿaliyy:un ***
wa ʾanṣāru ***
ʿašaraẗu dirham:in ʾillā ḫarrūbaẗ:an
ăr rayyisu ḫarṣ:un ʿalà dirhamayni wa niṣf:in
*** ăl ḥuraysiyyu ḫarṣ:un wa balāḏuri ʿalà
dirhamayni wa ṯalāṯi miʾaẗi darāhima wa rubʿ:in
bnu ăš šāʿiri ʿalà saydūqa wa yaʿsira
fa badalu hu rahn:un ʿalà ṯamāniyaẗa ʿašara dirham
s*** ăl wālī ʿinda hu rubāʿ:un wa subʿ:un
muḥammadu bnu mālik:ini ăl ǧazziyyu dirhamayni
ăš šarīfu ʾabū ăl faraǧi ḫamsaẗu darāhima
***
***
*** ăl wālī ṯalāṯīna ***
*** niṣf:un wa rubʿ:un wa **
*** ăṭ ṭāhir dirhamayni
*** bnu nāṣir:in rubʿ:un wa ṯumnu murabbaʿaẗ:in
kurzu bnu yāsīna ăn naǧǧāru dirhamayni wa niṣf:un
wa sittaẗu darāhima
ăl ʿasākiru rubʿ:un
*** ăl ḥāwī rubʿ:un wa ḫarrūbaẗ:un
*** ʿaliyy sittaẗu darāhima
ø
ø
ǧaʿfaru bnu ḥasan:in dirham:un ***
yāsī bnu ʾanktū ʾanktuwā dirham:un ***
ø
milāyaẗu ăl ḥabašiyyaẗi kisāʾu ăl yahūdi ʿalà
ʾaḥad:in wa ʿišrīna dirham
ḥasan:uni ăs saqqāʾu niṣf:un wa ṯumn:un
murǧānu bnu humāma dirham:un wa rubʿ:un
ăš šayḫu ʿallām:un rubʿ:un wa ḫarrūbaẗ:un
*** kirām ***
ăl waṣiyyaẗu ăl ʿa*** ***
ḥamzaẗu bnu binti ăl ʿizziyyi dirham:un ***
*** ġulām saʿīd:in ʾarbaʿaẗu darāhima
ṣafà wa rubʿ:un
ǧābir:uni ăl ʿazīzu rubʿ:un
faraǧu ăz zimāmu talātaẗu darāhima ʿalà
*** wa rubʿ:in
ṭawq:un li ʾummi qaššāša dirhamayni ***
ø
***
***
***
***
***
***
ʿabdu ăl lāhi ăṭ ṭarnāḥiyyu rubʿ:un
ø
ʿazīzu bnu sī ăn nāǧī dirham:un wa rubʿ:un
ʾabū ḫamīsa ʾarbaʿaẗa ʿašara dirham hiya
li ǧalbi ǧurūm:in wa mursali hi wa qad ***
yamāniyy
ʾabū ḥasan:in tamāniyaẗu darāhima wa niṣf:un wa ***
rizqatu hu qādimaẗ:un wa mursalu hu ǧurūm:un ***
*** wa talāṯaẗ darāhima ***
*** dirham ḫarṣ:un ʿalà ***
*** slyn maʿa hu lawz ʾaġarr
*** ăl waṣiyyaẗ ăd danāwiyy qināwiyy ṯamāniyaẗu
darāhima wa rubʿu musaddas:in
*** ǧaʿfar dirham:un wa ***
*** bnu ḥamāda ăl milāḥiyyu ***
saʿd:un ġulāmu ăl wālī rubāʿ:un ***
ʾabū muḥammad:in ġallaẗ:un baṭṭaẗ:un ʿalà dirham:in
wa tumn:un wa ḫums:un
*** ***ʾ ḫirqaẗ rahn ʿalà
*** niṣf:in ʾillā ḫarrūbaẗ:an
*** ***ī niṣf:un
li qīmaẗi ăl kayyāli talātaẗu darāhima wa rubʿ:un ***
maḫrūǧu ăl kayyāli dirhamayni sawā sawwā
ʿāliyy:un šarafu ăd dīni qatādaẗu rahn:un ʿalà ʿašri darāhima
wa rubʿ:in wa suds:in
ʿuṯmānu bnu ḥamzaẗa tammāmu rahn:un ʿalà ʿišrīna dirham
wa niṣf:in sawwā
ʿabdu ăl lāhi bnu yāsī ḫamsaẗu darāhima wa niṣf:un

[...] the client of [...]
[...] ibn [.........]
Sālim the superintendent [: ..]:
six dirhams [.........].
ʿArafāt: a half and a quarter [dirhams].
Ḥamūda al-Ḥāwī: estimated at [...].
[...] Sulṭān: a quarter [dirham].
Ḥusayn al-Ḥijājī the money changer: eight
and a quarter, and one-sixth dirhams.
The municipal judge: two and a half dirhams.
al-Rushd ʿAlī: [.........].
And Anṣār [:.......:]
ten dirhams minus a fraction (?).
al-Rayyis: estimated at two and a half dirhams.
[...] al-Ḥuraysī and Balādhurī: estimated at
three hundred (?) and two and a quarter dirhams.
Ibn al-Shāʿir owes Saydūq and Yaʿsir
[an amount] that is the equivalent of a pledge of eighteen dirhams.
The [...] of the mayor owes a quarter and one-seventh [dirhams].
Muḥammad ibn Mālik al-Jazzī: two dirhams.
Sharīf Abū al-Faraj: five dirhams.
[... the ma]yor: thirty [....]
[...] a half and a quarter and [...].
[... .] al-Ṭāhir: two dirhams.
[... .] ibn Nāṣir: a quarter and 1/32 [dirham].
Kurz ibn Yāsīn the carpenter: two and a half dirhams
and six d[irhams].
al-ʿAsākir: a quarter [dirham].
[...] al-Ḥāwī: a quarter [dirham] plus a fraction.
[...] ʿAlī: six dirhams.
Jaʿfar ibn Ḥasan: one dirham [...].
Yāsī ibn Anktū (? or Anktuwā): one dirham [...].
The Ethiopian gowns and Jewish cloaks [are valued] at
twenty-one dirhams.
Ḥasan the water carrier: a half and one-eighth [dirham].
Murjān ibn Humām: one and a quarter dirhams.
Shaykh ʿAllām: a quarter [dirham] and a fraction.
[...] Kirām [......].
The orders by the super[intendent ......]
Ḥamza ibn Bint al-ʿIzzī: one dirham [...].
[...] the slave boy of Saʿīd: four and a quarter dirhams.
Cleared accounts:
Jābir al-ʿAzīz: a quarter [dirham].
Faraj al-Zimām: three d[irhams, which is valued] at
[...] and a quarter dirhams.
The necklace for Umm Qashshāsh: two dirhams [...].
ʿAbd Allāh al-Ṭarnāḥī: a quarter [dirham].
ʿAzīz ibn Sī al-Nājī: one and a quarter dirhams.
Abū Khamīs: fourteen dirhams; and it is
to pay for the Nile barges and the dispatches; [they] have already [......]
Yemen.
Abū Ḥasan: eight and a half dirhams, and [...].
His provision is forthcoming; and the dispatches and barges [are to be expected?].
[......] and three dirhams [..........].
[... dir]ham, estima[ted] at [......]
[To be dis]patched with it are almonds of the highest quaility.
[...] orders [from] al-Danāwī: eight
and 1/24 dirhams.
[...] Jaʿfar: one dirham and [...].
[...] ibn Ḥamād al-Milāḥī: [......].
Saʿd, the slave boy of the mayor: a quarter [dirham ...].
Abū Muḥammad: a baṭṭa-container of grain, [valued] at one
and 1/40 dirhams.
[......] clothes on loan, [valued] at
[.....] and a half [dirhams] minus a fraction.
[...]ī: a half [dirham].
The sum [weighed by] the grain measurer is worth three and a quarter dirhams and [...].
Yield [at the estimation of] the grain measurer: two dirhams. Account cleared.
ʿAlī Sharaf al-Dīn Qatāda: owes ten
and a quarter and one-sixth dirhams worth of the rahn-pledges.
ʿUthmān ibn Ḥamza Tammām: owed twenty
and a half dirhams of the rahn-pledges. Account cleared.
ʿAbd Allāh ibn Yāsī: five and a half dirhams.
